data.name: ConfirmAccount
data.comment: Progress indicator message when confirming a MEGA account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ResumeTransfers
data.comment: Progress indicator message when resuming transfers - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RenameNode
data.comment: Progress indicator message when renaming a node - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveNode
data.comment: Progress indicator message when removing a node (file or folder) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PrepareUploads
data.comment: Progress indicator message when preparing uploads - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PrepareDownloads
data.comment: Progress indicator message when preparing downloads - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PauseTransfers
data.comment: Progress indicator message when pausing transfers - (String as short as possible).

data.name: NodeToTrash
data.comment: Progress indicator message when moving a node to the rubbish bin (trash) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MoveNode
data.comment: Progress indicator message when moving a node to a different parent - (String as short as possible).

data.name: Logout
data.comment: Progress indicator message when logging out - (String as short as possible).

data.name: Login
data.comment: Progress indicator message when logging in - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoadNodes
data.comment: Progress indicator message when building a nodes view - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ImportFile
data.comment: Progress indicator message when importing a file - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPreview
data.comment: Progress indicator message when getting a preview - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetLink
data.comment: Progress indicator message when getting a link to export a node - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetAccountDetails
data.comment: Progress indicator message when getting account details - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FetchingNodes
data.comment: Progress indicator message when loading nodes from MEGA web service - (String as short as possible). Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include current number of fetched nodes.

data.name: FastLogin
data.comment: Progress indicator message when resuming a session - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DownloadLink
data.comment: Progress indicator message when retieving a download link - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DeleteNode
data.comment: Progress indicator message when deleting a node (folder or file) indicating the name - (String as short as possible). Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include node name.

data.name: CreateFolder
data.comment: Progress indicator message when creating a folder - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreateAccount
data.comment: Progress indicator message when creating a MEGA account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CancelSubscription
data.comment: Progress indicator message when canceling a subscription - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UpgradeAccount
data.comment: Progress indicator message when upgrading an account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetUserData
data.comment: Progress indicator message when getting account details - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreditCardStore
data.comment: Progress indicator message when storing a credit card - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPaymentMethods
data.comment: Progress indicator message when getting payment methods - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPaymentUrl
data.comment: Progress indicator message when getting a payment Url - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ReplyContactRequestIgnore
data.comment: Progress indicator message when ignoring a contact request - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ReplyContactRequestDeny
data.comment: Progress indicator message when denying a contact request - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ReplyContactRequestAccept
data.comment: Progress indicator message when accepting a contact request - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveContact
data.comment: Progress indicator message when removing a contact - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InviteContactRemind
data.comment: Progress indicator message when reminding a contact request - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InviteContactDelete
data.comment: Progress indicator message when deleting a contact request - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InviteContactAdd
data.comment: Progress indicator message when sending a contact request - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetContactData
data.comment: Progress indicator message when getting contact details - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ChangePassword
data.comment: Progress indicator message when changing the MEGA account password - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CleanRubbishBin
data.comment: Progress indicator message when emptying the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CloseAllSessions
data.comment: Progress indicator message when clossing all sessions - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CloseSession
data.comment: Progress indicator message when clossing a session - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RemoveLink
data.comment: Progress indicator message when removing a link to export a node - (String as short as possible).
